channel.title: Posts on 漢黨 Han Party
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on 漢黨 Han Party

item.title: Chinese and Han
item.description: Huaxia and Han are the names of the same name and different times. China is also called “summer” and “summer” and “China”. China is interlinked with Xia, “Xia” is also called “Hua”. Han: it originally refers to the river of heaven and the river of the universe. The poem says, “there is Han in heaven, and there is light in prison.”. In the old Han Dynasty, it was called Han people, and got its name because of the Han Dynasty.

item.title: Xiaosui
item.description: Today’s Xiaosui is on the 23rd day of the twelfth lunar month. At this point, every household is hygienic and has a good year’s taste. After Xiaosui, it’s new year. Xiaosui is a dress rehearsal on the first day of the lunar calendar. It’s a beautiful wish for Chinese people to say goodbye to the old and welcome the new. There are kitchen king, window decoration, Spring Festival couplets, dust cleaning, marriage, eating sesame candy and dumplings in the small age customs.
